path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - AshWard Token and IDO - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Timestamp Dependence
findings.description: The smart contract relies on timestamp or block number, which can be manipulated by miners.

findings.title: DoS with (Unexpected) revert
findings.description: Denial of Service attack caused by an unexpected revert operation, potentially disrupting contract functionality.

findings.title: Gas Usage, Gas Limit and Loops
findings.description: Potential gas usage inefficiencies or vulnerabilities related to gas limits and loops.

findings.title: Redundant fallback function
findings.description: The contract contains a redundant fallback function which can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.
